nodes.text: The Anduvia system was located in the Immalia sector. It was a part of the Expansion Region, being located both in the Outer Expansion Zone sub-region and the Northern Dependencies portion of that region. A hyperlane connected the system to the Immalia and Vorian systems.
The Anduvia system was the origin point of Anduvian salt tablets, and it fell within the borders of the New Republic in 12 ABY.
The Anduvia system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square K-8.
